column5: Anyone have a suggestion in central ONT of a place with a decent cabin that one can drive to from the Detroit area (within maybe 10 hours driving) with good fishing for walleye, pike, and possibly speckled trout? Reasonable rates would be nice too. Money's just too tight to do a fly in and think I might be able to convince some friends to make a go of it if its a reasonable price. Thanks, Steve

you may want to consider ray's camps on ramsey lake. you drive to biscotasing which is on bisco lake then take a 10 mile barge ride to a portage up to ramsey where the lodge is located. i used this camp for many years back in the 70's an 80's when the original owner ray was still around but haven't been there in years. new owners just bought the place this year. phish
forgot to mention the web site for ray's: http://www.rayscamps.com/
thanks for the come back... i'll look into them.
